short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables Screen Sharing for your Vmeet Virtual Meeting Space.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension enables users of the Vmeet web client to share their screen with other conference participants. It does this by allowing any web pages that use the Vmeet WebRTC implementation to have access to Chrome's screensharing facility.

The first time a user shares their screen they will be prompted to allow use of this extension. On subsequent attempts to share your screen from the same domain, you will not be prompted again. If you access the Vmeet web client from a different domain, you will be asked again to grant that domain access to the extension.
